name: The Legend of Spyro: Dawn of the Dragon (DS)
name_original: The Legend of Spyro: Dawn of the Dragon (DS)
description:
The Legend of Spyro: Dawn of the Dragon (DS) is a game developed by Tantalus Media. It was originally released in 2008. Activision Blizzard published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, The Legend of Spyro: Dawn of the Dragon (DS) has a score of 57. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play The Legend of Spyro: Dawn of the Dragon (DS) on Nintendo DS.
